Attributes.description: Steady and transient conduction. Radiation heat transfer. Convective heat and mass transfer in pipes and from external surfaces. Design of heat exchangers.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: Either (a) MECH 225 or (b) one of CHBE 241, ENPH 257, PHYS 203 and one of CHBE 251, CIVL 215, MECH 280.
